create_usage_time_ds_log:
CREATE TABLE IF  NOT EXISTS bi_interface_spap.usage_time(
                                  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
								  `uid` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID',
								  `time1` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time2` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time3` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time4` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time5` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time6` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time7` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time8` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time9` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time10` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time11` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time12` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time13` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time14` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time15` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time16` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time17` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time18` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time19` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time20` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time21` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time22` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time23` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `time24` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
								  `create_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '当前数据属于哪一天（时间戳：不包含时、分、秒、毫秒）',
								  `os_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'osName',
								  `oper_ip` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
								  `channel` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '渠道',
								  `app_version` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '司派版本号',
 								  
								  `year` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
                                  `month` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
                                  `day` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
                                  `hour` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
                                  `store_id` INT ( 9 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分区id'
								) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8421611243179264360 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
select_source_sql:
SELECT
                              `id` ,
							  `uid` ,
							  `time1`,
							  `time2`,
							  `time3`,
							  `time4`,
							  `time5`,
							  `time6`,
							  `time7`,
							  `time8`,
							  `time9`,
							  `time10`,
							  `time11`,
							  `time12`,
							  `time13`,
							  `time14`,
							  `time15`,
							  `time16`,
							  `time17`,
							  `time18`,
							  `time19`,
							  `time20`,
							  `time21`,
							  `time22`,
							  `time23`,
							  `time24`,
							  `create_time`,
							  `os_name`,
							  oper_ip,
							  ifnull(channel,-9) as channel,
							  app_version
                        FROM
                            spap_data_center.usage_time 
                        LIMIT ${offset} , ${rows}
insert_usage_time_log:
INSERT INTO bi_interface_spap.usage_time (
	                              `id` ,
								  `uid` ,
								  `time1`,
								  `time2`,
								  `time3`,
								  `time4`,
								  `time5`,
								  `time6`,
								  `time7`,
								  `time8`,
								  `time9`,
								  `time10`,
								  `time11`,
								  `time12`,
								  `time13`,
								  `time14`,
								  `time15`,
								  `time16`,
								  `time17`,
								  `time18`,
								  `time19`,
								  `time20`,
								  `time21`,
								  `time22`,
								  `time23`,
								  `time24`,
								  `create_time`,
								  `os_name`,
								  `oper_ip`	,
								   channel,
							 	   app_version,
                                  `year`,
                                  `month`,
                                  `day`,
                                  `hour`,
                                  store_id )
                            VALUES
                                (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
